author: Del Quentin Wilber
title: James Comey’s Book to Launch Next Week as Trump Keeps Up Scrutiny of Investigations
text:
James Comey’s memoir hits bookstores Tuesday, with the former FBI director planning a series of media appearances that will put him back in the public eye as a government watchdog is set to release a report examining his conduct in office.
The media appearances, starting with an interview on ABC Sunday night, come amid a charged atmosphere around special counsel Robert Mueller’s investigation into Russia’s electoral interference, which started with the Federal Bureau of Investigation under Mr. Comey, and President Donald...
